transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	wildcardPaths:['*_registration.csv']) ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	wildcardPaths:['*_permit.csv']) ~> source2
source1 derive(BranchCR = toString(byName('BranchCR')),
		Status = toString(byName('Status')),
		SourceFileName = SourceFileName) ~> MapDrifted1
source2 derive(CR_Number = toString(byName('ns0:ID')),
		Name_Arabic = toString(byName('env:Envelope_env:Body_GetCommercialPermitInfoResponse_Output_ns0:commercialPermit_ns0:establishmentCommercialName_ns0:nameArabic')),
		Name_English = toString(byName('env:Envelope_env:Body_GetCommercialPermitInfoResponse_Output_ns0:commercialPermit_ns0:establishmentCommercialName_ns0:nameEnglish')),
		MunicipalityName_Arabic = toString(byName('env:Envelope_env:Body_GetCommercialPermitInfoResponse_Output_ns0:commercialPermit_ns0:municipalityName_ns0:nameArabic')),
		Street_Number = toString(byName('env:Envelope_env:Body_GetCommercialPermitInfoResponse_Output_ns0:commercialPermit_ns0:location_ns0:street_ns0:number')),
		StreetName_Arabic = toString(byName('env:Envelope_env:Body_GetCommercialPermitInfoResponse_Output_ns0:commercialPermit_ns0:location_ns0:street_ns0:name_ns0:nameArabic')),
		Zone_Number = toString(byName('env:Envelope_env:Body_GetCommercialPermitInfoResponse_Output_ns0:commercialPermit_ns0:location_ns0:zone_ns0:number')),
		ZoneName_Arabic = toString(byName('env:Envelope_env:Body_GetCommercialPermitInfoResponse_Output_ns0:commercialPermit_ns0:location_ns0:zone_ns0:name_ns0:nameArabic')),
		SourceFileName = SourceFileName) ~> MapDrifted2
MapDrifted2, MapDrifted1 join(CR_Number == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
